p: The viral pneumonia in Wuhan City, China has spread around China. The virus has been proven to be a novel coronavirus (named as “2019-nCoV”) by World Health Organization (WHO). 2019-nCoV belongs to beta-coronavirus genera. On January 30, 2020, WHO re-evaluated the potential effects of 2019-nCoV infection in global public health, and declared this epidemic as a “Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC)”.
